lines.text: [Anne is pregnant]
How'd it get in there?
Andy, we've already had this discussion about where babies come from.
I know, but I want to hear it from her.
Andy!
I just want a second opinion.
Andy, it's really simple, when a boy and a girl really like eachother a lot, and they spend enough time together, sometimes they just make a baby.
Spending time together, huh? I'd better call Susie, and tell her we have to cool it!
You think The Sound of Music is the scariest movie of all time?
The hills are alive!

[singing]
Hey, Leo! Look, Leo... There's a pigeon on your car! Hey, Leo! Look, Leo... There's a pigeon on your car! Well, you can't go far with a bird on your car. Everybody knows that's true. Hey, Leo! Look, Leo... whadya think you're gonna do?
I've invented vegetable ice cream. I call this, Brocoli Surprise. Be brutal.
All right, just give me this. It's not bad, Andy. What is the, uh, surprise?
No brocoli.
Hey, Lou, you still having those wild dreams about me?
Yeah, I am. Every night, it's exactly like one of those Calvin Klein commercials.
You mean hot and sexy, huh?
No, I mean annoying, confusing, and about thirty seconds long.
Feel me.
What?
Feel me, am I warm?
Get lost!

[about Andy]
Look at him, Mom, he's disgusting. He's always pulling things out of his nose, his ears. Wipin' it on his shirt. He's like a third base coach.
[wipes his hands on a napkin]
That's my napkin.
Excuse me, Mom, I have to go wash my hands.

[picking up his napkin]
Hahah, I love doing that!
If you like someone, does it matter if they're not the same age?
No, of course not. Andy, do you like a girl?
That's a little personal, don't you think, Mom?
What, what are you lookin' at?
Nothing!
It's the shirt, right?
No!
I was gonna change.
So change!
It is the shirt!
After your dad was, ah, "Lost at Sea," um, did your mom date a lot?
We had to eat.
Did, she, like, ever get married without letting you know?
Just once in the 60's, but it was null the next day. The Kennedys are a very powerful family... We had to eat!
Neurotic, Germiphobic, Afraid of Heights.
What are you working on, buddy, your résumé?
What're you doing?
Getting into bed.
Yeah, this is my bed. There's a sleeping bag on the floor for you.
The floor's drafty, Joe. If I get sick, I'll be of no help to you.
You're no help to me now!
My God... There is a bag... Of corn chips in your bed!
I take that back, you are helping out.
[about Matt's pimple]
I can't see anything.
Just because you can't see it, doesn't mean it isn't there!

[with a French accent]
Ack, Americans!
Let's party!
[the guys cheer]
Master Kim says that a true warrior fights alone.
Master Kim works nights at Seven Eleven.
So who should know better than him?
Master Kim says a man who faces combat has already won.
The last thing Master Kim said to me was "Shut freezer door. You melt popsicle."
How did your date go?
First I was yelled at for being late; I was told I looked like a mess. Then I got stuck with the check.
What kind of guy would do that?
He was long gone. I mean Claire.

[from inside a limousine]
Pardon me, have you any Grey Poupon?
How much does Chevy Chase make for six films?
I don't know, noe?
Right on!
Nut!
No, thank you!
